_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Empyrion
author: thephenom1811@gmail.com
description: Empyrion: Galactic Survival dedicated server in Wine.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Empyrion Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt -y install curl unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

chown -R root:root /mnt
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam

export HOME=/mnt/server

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

chmod -R 777 /mnt
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 530870 validate +quit
